summary: Implements the Moto response layer for the Amazon Bedrock Agents service, routing incoming HTTP requests to backend methods that create, retrieve, list, and delete agents and knowledge bases, as well as manage resource tags, and returning the results as JSON payloads.
business_intent: Provide a mock implementation of the Bedrock Agents API to enable developers to test and develop applications that interact with agents and knowledge bases without requiring access to the real AWS service.
